language.entry: I am fading. Perhaps I have ascended once more?
My fragile body begins to dissipate. Am I to join the heavens?
I begin to disappear. Have I become an angel?
I return to a physical form. Perhaps my duty is not done.
I am released into reality once more. The Light still has need of me.
Returned to my mortal state, I will continue my holy quest.
He fills me with a resurgence of divine vitality!
I am not to die yet! The Light has deemed it so!
I am awakened, the Light shines through me!
The power fades. I only hope I used it well...
I have used his gift well, and I return it to him...
I have used up all of his gift, and eagerly await his next blessing...
My plate is divine. It is impregnable!
He gives me his blessing. He protects me from harm!
My faith shields me from all harm!
My protections weakens for now, but it shall return...
He must conserve his strength, so I will endure...
He requires a test. Survival without his protection...
I leave this mortal plane, and view the battle from beyond...
Hidden from unfaithful eyes, I strike true.
The Light is blinding. They cannot hope to lay sight on me.
My faith remains unbroken!
He continues to protect me!
My bulwark remains impenetrable!
My plate is strong. I will not fall.
My fragile body is protected by a shell of iron. I will not yield!
I am vigilant. No blow will pierce my defense!
The Light blinds the unfaithful!
Their eyes burn! They cannot handle the sins of their deeds!
Creatures of shadow, become vanquished by the Light!
They cower before his Radiance!
Our faith is strong! Theirs is weak!
I am immovable! They only weaken as the fight foes on!
Vile creatures! Their toxic deeds burn them from within!
The sin they carry is heavy. It will burn within their hearts!
I splash holy water upon you, and watch as you burn away!
We have the aid of a divine being, we shall not fail!
Know that even if we fall, we are guaranteed an afterlife in the heavens!
No matter how terrifying, the shadows always flee before the Light!
My faith pushes me forward!
My body is failing, yet I push on!
With his aid, I can survive the deadliest of blows!
"Foul demons of the earth and air, Shall flee from thy presence fair!"
"We bow us to our lot of care, Hear for a maid a maiden's prayer!"
"Safe may we sleep beneath thy care, Maiden! Hear a maiden's prayer!"
Visage
Get out of my head! GET OUT OF MY HEAD!!!
I never chose this life! He made me his slave!
He grows impatient, and I will be the victim of his wrath!
P-please! I did what you asked! Spare me!
Sin and darkness corrupt our ranks!
How did I not see. Heretics and traitors inhabit our numbers!
My sword guides me to evil, and it points to you!
He reveals the truth! You all conspire against the Light!
You are all influenced by the darkness, and I must purge it from you.
Every wound brings me closer to the Light!
Pain! I yearn for its twisted caress!
"And so through the blood of a saint, all will be redeemed for their sins."
I have sinned, so I must be punished!
The Light demands my suffering, so I shall suffer!
Your faith is weak, you don't deserve the Light's comfort!
You doubt his will, so you too should be struck down!
You must all suffer, as I have suffered!
You think only of yourself, and for that you shall be punished!
His rule is absolute. Your independence will only bring disaster!
He speaks to me, and me ONLY!
He has chosen me as his avatar! He does not care about the rest of you!
I alone am chosen to join him. I alone will survive.
He frowns upon you all, but smiles for me!
My death would be mourned, so you must die in my place!
...He grows quiet...
I ask for guidance, only to be met with silence...
I've been abandoned. I am nothing...
I've disappointed him, and now he deserts me...
Please...just a word...speak to me...
DIVINE INTERVENTION!
HE HAS TAKEN ME! I HAVE NO CONTROL!
NOW YOU SHALL KNOW THE WRATH OF A GOD!
YOU DISGRACE MY AVATAR, SO YOU SHALL BE CLEANSED!
HIS WILL OVERWHELMS MY OWN!
Stand behind me! The Light protects us all!
Do not fear! I am a bulwark against the darkness!
I am guided by the Light! I know my purpose!
Cower before the ever-burning Flame!
I overflow with divine power! My sword will strike true!
He speaks his will, and I obey!
Evil flees in the presence of the Light!
"The Light will execute judgement by fire, and those slain will be many!"
Even Death obeys the Light's command!
My body can always be broken, but my spirit is indomitable!
No deed is too much! No evil is too great!
I will never be lost as long as he guides me!
Rally to the Light, and know that darkness will not follow!
I am a celestial being, and these terrors stand no chance against us!
It is time. Bring swift justice to your foes!
Judgement shall be passed! Smite thine foes without mercy!
We are the Flame, and evil burns in our presence!
We are the Light's chosen, and no creature can stand against us!
I am blessed with the will to push on!
I've transcended my mortal body, and have become something more!
I want to return to my home! I want to see my family!
SAVE ME FROM HIM!!!
This is not my fate! I want to live!
Doubt in your eyes! Your intentions are not pure!
You do not fight for justice! You fight only for yourself!
You would spill blood for gold, he tells me so!
I would suffer a thousand lashes, if it would please you!
Punish me! Allow me to repent!
This body is ravaged! Make it feel again!
You think you are worthy of the title of "hero"? How pathetic!
You have not proven yourselves! You do not deserve pity!
Cowards! The Light would not mourn your deaths!
You have no purpose, but the Light has great things in store for me!
You do not hear his voice! You are not chosen!
I am one of few chosen disciples of the Light. You are little more than peasants!
It is hopeless, he has left us for the fiends...
I am nothing without his guidance...
I was promised I would succeed. Yet I fail...
YOU ARE IN THE PRESENCE OF THE LIGHT! KNEEL!
HIS POWER! IT COURSES THROUGH MY BODY!
I WILL STRIKE YOU DOWN WITH HOLY FIRE!
N-no! I don't want to die!
I was never a hero! I just want to live!
Let me return home! I cannot fight these horrors!
Fiends cloaked as allies lurk in the shadows! I must remain vigilant!
You cannot sneak up on me! I have the Light's eye watching over me!
I know how the heretics act, and I will not fall for their tricks!
FIGHT ME, FIENDS!
The Light shall protect me as it always has!
I deserve the suffering, not them!
FLEE, MINIONS OF EVIL!!!
DARKNESS SHALL BE ERADICATED!!!
A GOD HAS NOTHING TO FEAR!!!
P-please! You are tearing me apart!
Holy Light! Please forgive me!
I cannot handle any more! Light, please spare me!
Kill me quickly, so I may hear the Light's voice once more...
A leap of faith, so that the Light may forgive my mistakes...
In death, perhaps he will grace me with his presence...
I-I do not know the path!
I am lost without his guidance!
I am a weapon without my wielder!
The Light chose me for the task, not you!
Move aside! The manuscripts will tell of my holy deeds!
You will have no part in this creature's death!
The Light demands that you fight!
I am told to withdraw, so withdraw I must!
The Light commands that I retreat!
*sobbing*
P-please spare me!
I was born a peasant, not a warrior!
I will stand vigilant, and wait for the turncoats to strike!
I must watch my allies for corruption!
The Light has advised me of your betrayal, and I will not fall into your trap!
The Light has granted me a moment of respite, and I will not refuse.
My presence alone is enough to keep the monsters at bay.
Shh! I must hear the Light's will!
I am without will...
Any action could be seen as defiance to his holy vision...
It must be a test of my faith! I will not fail him.
THIS VESSEL FIGHTS FOR CONTROL!!!
YOU DARE DENY ME?!
*INCOHERENT BABBLING*
You cannot predict the Light's command!
You do not know what he wills!
I have orders from the divine!
FOR THE LIGHT!
I SHALL BECOME A MARTYR!
BE PURGED!
Behold peasants, the will of the Light!
I only do as the Light wishes!
You cannot hope to comprehend his command.
I will not listen to false words!
The Light is the one true commander!
Your simple orders have no control over me!
I am a sheep without its shepherd!
I do what I believe the Light demands!
I only seek to appease the Light!
FLEE BEFORE MY WRATH!!!
NONE CAN HOPE TO WITHSTAND MY MIGHT!!!
MY WILL IS ABSOLUTE!!!
He will return again, and I will lose control of my mind!
It owns me. I have no choice but to serve...
Why was I chosen? I never asked for this...
Searing pain and merciless death await any who approach me. You've been warned.
With the watchful eye of the Light, no fiend will ambush me in the night.
I know what you plan. The Light has told me everything.
Comfort can be found in the embrace of the flame!
I burn my flesh so that sin may be extinguished from my body.
I once feared pain as you did, but now I crave it more than anything.
You are not allowed rations. It is a test of your faith.
A crew of weak-willed fools is what you are. Not even worthy of the Light's gaze.
What little devotion you have left is insulting. You should be ashamed.
It is his decree that all rations are to belong to me.
He demands our sharings as donations to the cause, and it will be so.
You are to serve ME. It is his wish.
*sobbing*...Please speak to me...
I am lost without him. My existence means nothing...
Perhaps I must offer my life for a chance at forgiveness...
THE FIRE MUST BE BRIGHTER!
YOU SERVE A HIGHER POWER! DO NOT DISAPPOINT ME!
MY COMMAND IS LAW! DEFIANCE WOULD BE HERESY!
I am destined for martyrdom, so make it so!
The Light demands my sacrifice, so it shall be!
You cannot break that which is broken!
Unite me with the Light...
This evil will deliver me to the Light...
THIS VESSEL IS MERELY A TOOL! NOTHING MORE!
I WILL NOT YIELD!
"Through the blood of saints, all are redeemed."
Light, accept this offering of the flesh!
Death will guide me to him...
I must hear him again...
THIS BODY MUST BE PUSHED BEYOND MORTAL BOUNDS!
THIS BEING CANNOT CONTAIN MY POWER!
Traitors seek to slip away! I will not allow it!
No evil may pass me!
Don't you see? They will deliver us to the Light...
The Light will not accept cowards into his domain...
REPENT!
Suffer! We shall all suffer!
YOU WILL NOT DENY ME!!!
FIGHT FOR YOUR GOD!!!
*crying*
N-no! I want to live!
Malevolent blows guided by heresy!
All conspire against the Light!
You peasants value your own lives over that of a disciple? How sinful!
I may die a martyr, but you will be remembered as cowards!
My blood consecrates these tainted lands!
Strike harder! This body wishes to feel again!
HAHAHA! YOUR BLOWS DO NOTHING TO DETER MY POWER!
ONLY COMPLETE OBLITERATION WILL STOP ME!
YOU MAY DESTROY THIS VESSEL, BUT ANOTHER WILL TAKE ITS PLACE!
NO WOUND WILL HALT MY CRUSADE!
Mother! Father! Save meeeeeeee!
I have no faith, I am no one!
Insidious tricks to mislead me! I will not lose focus!
I know what game you play, demon!
This one seeks to halt my ascension!
Do not be afraid! I embrace the pain!
YOU COWER BEFORE ME, AS YOU SHOULD!
YOUR WEAKNESS WILL BE PUNISHED WITH DEATH!
The Light has deemed that one for me, not you!
I will not let you steal my offering to the Light!
The Light did not order you to attack, nitwit!
You strike with weak faith, and for that you shall be punished!
YOU ATTACK OUT OF LINE, INSECT!
SUCH A WEAK ATTACK! STRIKE HARDER!
Flee! FLEE WHILE WE STILL CAN!!!
We cannot fight these abominations!
You only prove that you conspire against me.
All are corrupted, and I am alone in this hell.
Your devotion to the Light is insulting.
You'd serve us better as a sacrifice.
Without the command of the Light, you are little more than a bumbling oaf.
You lack the guidance that I am blessed with.
FOOL! YOU WILL BE PUNISHED FOR YOUR MISTAKE!
YOU DARE FAIL ME! YOU WILL BE CRUSHED BY MY MIGHT!
Spare me! Let me return to my simple life!
I don't want to become of a victim to this corruption!
Evil betrays evil, such is their nature.
Darkness and corruption, nothing more than a serpent consuming its own tail.
You will not achieve martyrdom as I have!
You think the Light will accept your blood tithe?! You know little of faith!
Embrace the suffering, or die to it.
This is your trial. Will you break like the weakling you are?
EMBRACE PAIN AND FUTILITY!
DO NOT SHY AWAY FROM THE PAIN! MAKE THE SUFFERING A PART OF YOU!
Our luck will surely end, let us escape while we still can!
His fickle blessings will stop, let us not risk our lives!
They dance about like demonic imps!
They seek to allure me into their deceiving act!
I HAVE SAVED YOU WITH MY BLESSING! DO NOT DISAPPOINT ME!
I HAVE SPARED YOUR LIFE. NOW KNEEL AND WORSHIP ME!
Nooooo! They're too horrible!
HELP ME!
Come closer, and feel the flame of the righteous!
All evil will be incinerated by my presence, including you.
Step away! This is not your place to intervene!
THE BLOOD RITUAL IS SACROSANCT!
You were not commanded to move.
You dare defy his will?
STAY IN YOUR PLACE, INSECT!
YOU WILL BURN IN MY RADIANT LIGHT!
I will not. It smells of foul corruption!
It has not been thrice-blessed.
Will this help with the ritual?
This has no use to me.
Such devices would anger him further...
It has not been sanctioned...
I HAVE NO NEED FOR SUCH TRIVIALITIES.
YOUR MORTAL DEVICES WILL DO NOTHING FOR ME!
No witchcraft can compare to the Light's healing touch.
Your unholy magic is insulting to his power.
An insidious curse, most likely.
The Light demands no intervention!
Stop! You will disrupt the ceremony!
You dare pull me away from martyrdom?!
I will not betray him with your spellcraft...
I must remain devoted and only accept aid from him.
Only his touch can make me whole...
YOUR PATHETIC SPELLS CANNOT AID ME!
A GOD REQUIRES NO HEALING!
LEAVE THE VESSEL AS IS!
I will not accept your hex!
Your wicked touch will have no effect on me!
Away with you, wretched thing!
I am not to acquire aid from anyone!
I only need the strength of the pain!
He speaks clearly when I am weakened!
The spirit is shattered, and cannot be repaired...
You cannot help return his voice to me...
Do not aid me. Perhaps he is testing me...
YOUR OFFERING INSULTS ME!
YOU CANNOT AID A GOD!
YOUR BLESSING IS NOTHING TO ME!
He watches our every action, and he is pleased with our performance!
Celebrate our deeds, as we pave a new path for justice!
We may die, but our deeds will be remembered through time!
Allow me to recite a blessing for you.
*chanting*
He has granted you his healing touch, and you shall thank him with chivalrous deeds.
We will face harsh trails, but know that they are simply tests of our faith.
The Light is all powerful. No creature can stand against it.
Whether we live or die, the Light will ensure our salvation from the darkness.
I-I can't recite the blessings! They burn upon my tongue!
His power is an illusion! Evil cloaked as good!
*sobbing*
Even the Light's blessings are not powerful enough to cleanse their corrupted minds.
I will simply leave them to their devious scheming.
They are rabid dogs, looking to bite the hand that would feed them.
Holy Light! Accept my blood as redemption for my sins!
Please, you must whip me into submission! He demands it!
I shall flay my skin, and scrawl my many misdeeds upon it!
The Light will not offer comfort to those who do not deserve it.
With such unfaithful behaviour, how can he be expected to assist us at all?
You only take and take. You would never repay his kindness.
I hold many of his blessings, none of which are deserved by others.
He chose ME, so only I will be granted his boon.
He does not require my benevolence, so there is no need for such.
Without his blessing, I cannot help anyone...
I am a lost soul. I cannot give guidance to others...
I have no power. I would only make matters worse...
YOU ARE NOT WORTHY!
YOU MUST EARN MY FAVOR!
YOU HAVE FAILED TO PROVE YOURSELF!
I am in his sanctuary. Begone!
Your dark touch will not corrupt me!
I will not be a convert of evil!
As part of my trail, I must turn down all kindness.
He will not allow me such benevolence.
Please refrain! The suffering aids me!
You think you can provide what he does not? How ignorant.
You would simply tarnish my plate.
Your meager gift insults him.
There can be no rest for the damned...
I am not worthy of any benevolence...
If I were to accept, he would be angered...
DO NOT TOUCH THE VESSEL!
THIS ONE CANNOT BE HELPED!
It has not been sprinkled with holy water!
I can smell it. Corruption in the grain...
I must fast. It will help to make his voice clear.
You have it. He will favor me for my selflessness.
How can I accept such kindness after my faithless behaviour...
I cannot, as I must repent...
THIS VESSEL DOES NOT NEED SUSTENANCE!
A GOD DOES NOT EAT!
"Through thine sword of fire, thou shall smite the evil-doer and cleanse the land!"
You are guilty of heresy! Now you will pay!
He is angered, and I will deliver his wrath!
You shall suffer the consequence for your misbehaviour!
YOU HAVE INVITED MY WRATH, INSECT!
YOU INSULT MY POWER, SO YOU SHALL BE PUNISHED!
Purged in holy flame!
My blows strike true!
I have pleased the Light!
For the Light!
Vanquished!
Flee before his radiance!
Be cleansed!
My body is ruined, but my will does not falter!
I knocked on Death's door, and there was no answer...
My time has not come! The Light still has need of me!
You may destroy my body, but the Light will never let me die!
The Seo Special
The Iron Maidens
The Royal Family
Swords and Boards
Masked Crusaders
The Seraphim
Conflicting Elements
Guardians of Reality
Corpse Party
Horrors and Hallways
Angel Wings

Iconoclast

Warriors of Light
Judgement Day
A Light in the Darkness
Protect the King!

His voice grows louder...
Holy Chainmail
Faithful Pendant
Barbed Crown
Torturer's Mask
Radiant Censer
Consecrated Ashes
Heretical Standard
"All sin has been purged from my body!"
An Angel of the Light

Many prayers have been answered as a divine being walks into town, clad in thrice-blessed plate and wielding a holy sword and shield. However, to those not of faith, all that arrives is a disturbing iron maiden...
Annual Purging
Sin builds up like a tumor, and every year the divine must purge themselves of such abhorrence. Such a ritual is sacrosanct, and no one is allowed to disturb them during their cleansing.

MARTYR'S OFFERING
Rest. I shall protect us through the night.
Now, you shall be judged for the deeds you have fulfilled and the sins you have committed.
*chanting*
Only those who have sinned have anything to fear from me.
I was impure, and the Light allowed me to transcend.
I hear his words. He guides me on my quest.
Do not fear the flame, for it does not burn the pure.
I bestow the greatest gift of all to you, life.
Dull Sword
Sharpened Sword
Martyr's Sword
Sacred Sword
"The Vanquisher"
Sword

Battered Plate
Knight's Plate
Divine Plate
"The Offering"
Full Plate
My faith denies me such pleasures.
I do not belong here.
This place is rife with sin.
Allow me peace in the palace of the Light.

Saved by holy intervention, the Seraph seeks to protect her allies from darkness and corruption. She calls upon cleansing flames to purge evil and brand especially wicked creatures for judgement. As she nears death, her faith and connection to the Light grows stronger and she can call upon greater powers to vanquish her foes. However, even to those of faith, the Seraph is an unsettling defender. Her ghastly appearance and zealous fervor could be enough to push many into the realm of insanity.

The Seraph comes to battle adorned in full plate armor. In her hands, she carries a holy sword as her righteous right wing and a sturdy shield as her fortifying left wing. However, even with the protection of a mighty shield and plate, the Seraph's body is fragile. Should her armor fail her, she will surely perish.

To those who do not understand, the Seraph can be an intimidating presence. Her iron form and constant prayer make her seem almost alien compared to others of the same faith. But to those who follow the Light, the Seraph is a shining guardian sent to vanquish evil. Nowhere is safer than in the protection of her wings.

Many prayers have been answered as a divine being walks into town, clad in thrice-blessed plate and wielding a holy sword and shield. However, to those not of faith, all that arrives is a disturbing iron maiden...
Annual Purging
Sin builds up like a tumor, and every year the divine must purge themselves of such abhorrence. Such a ritual is sacrosanct, and no one is allowed to disturb them during their cleansing.

Saved by holy intervention, the Seraph seeks to protect her allies from darkness and corruption. She calls upon cleansing flames to purge evil and brand especially wicked creatures for judgement. As she nears death, her faith and connection to the Light grows stronger and she can call upon greater powers to vanquish her foes. However, even to those of faith, the Seraph is an unsettling defender. Her ghastly appearance and zealous fervor could be enough to push many into the realm of insanity.

The Seraph comes to battle adorned in full plate armor. In her hands, she carries a holy sword as her righteous right wing and a sturdy shield as her fortifying left wing. However, even with the protection of a mighty shield and plate, the Seraph's body is fragile. Should her armor fail her, she will surely perish.

To those who do not understand, the Seraph can be an intimidating presence. Her iron form and constant prayer make her seem almost alien compared to others of the same faith. But to those who follow the Light, the Seraph is a shining guardian sent to vanquish evil. Nowhere is safer than in the protection of her wings.

Redimida por graa divina, a Serafim procura proteger seus aliados da escurido e da corrupo. Ela invoca as chamas sagradas para purificar o mal e marca com fogo as criaturas mais perversas para seu julgamento final. Quando se aproxima da morte, sua f e conexo com a Luz se fortalecem podendo invocar maiores poderes para vencer seus inimigos. No entanto, mesmo para aqueles de f, a Serafim uma defensora inquietante. Sua aparncia fantasmagrica e fervor zeloso poderia ser o suficiente para empurrar muitos para o reino da insanidade.

A Serafim vai a batalha adornada em armadura de chapa completa. Em suas mos, ela carrega uma espada sagrada como sua asa direita e um escudo robusto como sua defensiva asa esquerda. No entanto, mesmo com a proteo de um poderoso escudo e armadura, o corpo da Serafim frgil. Caso sua armadura se quebre, ela certamente morrer.

Para aqueles que no entendem, a Serafim pode ser uma presena intimidante. Sua forma de ferro e orao constante fazem com que ela parea uma desconhecida comparada com outros da mesma f. Mas para aqueles que seguem a Luz, a Serafim uma guardi brilhante enviada para vencer o mal. No h lugar mais seguro do que na proteo de suas asas.

Alors qu'elle s'approche de la mort, sa foi et sa connection la Lumire devient plus forte et elle peut faire appel des plus grands pouvoirs pour vaincre ses ennemis. Cependant, mme pour ceux de la foir, la Sraphin est un dfenseur intriguant. Saved by holy intervention, the Seraph seeks to protect her allies from darkness and corruption. She calls upon cleansing flames to purge evil and brand especially wicked creatures for judgement. As she nears death, her faith and connection to the Light grows stronger and she can call upon greater powers to vanquish her foes. However, even to those of faith, the Seraph is an unsettling defender. Her ghastly appearance and zealous fervor could be enough to push many into the realm of insanity.

The Seraph comes to battle adorned in full plate armor. In her hands, she carries a holy sword as her righteous right wing and a sturdy shield as her fortifying left wing. However, even with the protection of a mighty shield and plate, the Seraph's body is fragile. Should her armor fail her, she will surely perish.

To those who do not understand, the Seraph can be an intimidating presence. Her iron form and constant prayer make her seem almost alien compared to others of the same faith. But to those who follow the Light, the Seraph is a shining guardian sent to vanquish evil. Nowhere is safer than in the protection of her wings.

Molte preghiere hanno ricevuto risposta quando un essere divino arrivato in citt, rivestito con una armatura benedetta tre volte e brandendo una spada e uno scudo sacri. Tuttavia, per i non credenti, tutto ci che arrivato uninquietante figura di metallo...
Purga Annuale
Il peccato si accumula come un tumore e ogni anno i divini devono purgarsi di un simile sdegno. Un rituale del genere sacrosanto e a nessuno permesso disturbarli durante la loro purificazione.

Salvata da un intervento divino, il Serafino protegge i suoi alleati dalloscurit e dalla corruzione. Chiama fiamme purificatrici per purificare il mare e marchiare creature malvagie al giudizio della Luce. Quando si avvicina alla morte, la sua fede e la stretta connessione alla Luce si rafforzano e pu chiedere aiuto a poteri pi grandi per sgominare i suoi nemici. Tuttavia, persino agli uomini di fede, il Serafino un difensore inquietante. La sua apparenza e il suo fervore zelante potrebbero essere sufficienti a spingere persino gli eroi pi vissuti e coraggiosi nel reame della pazzia.

Il Serafino si fionda in battaglia adornata con un armatura sacra. Nella mano destra stringe una spada consacrata, mentre nella sinistra impugna un resistente scudo. Tuttavia, anche con la protezione di uno scudo e unarmatura possente, il corpo mortale del Serafino fragile. Se la sua armatura dovesse fallire, senza dubbio lei perirebbe.

Per coloro che non capiscono, il Serafino pu essere una presenza minacciosa. La sua forma ferrea e le sue costanti preghiere la fanno sembrare quasi aliena rispetto agli altri membri ecclesiastici. Ma per coloro che seguono la Luce, il Serafino un guardiano splendente mandato dalla Luce a sgominare ogni male. Nessun posto tanto sicuro quanto la protezione delle sue ali.
I am fading. Perhaps I have ascended once more?
My fragile body begins to dissipate. Am I to join the heavens?
I begin to disappear. Have I become an angel?
I return to a physical form. Perhaps my duty is not done.
I am released into reality once more. The Light still has need of me.
Returned to my mortal state, I will continue my holy quest.
He fills me with a resurgence of divine vitality!
I am not to die yet! The Light has deemed it so!
I am awakened, the Light shines through me!
The power fades. I only hope I used it well...
I have used his gift well, and I return it to him...
I have used up all of his gift, and eagerly await his next blessing...
My plate is divine. It is impregnable!
He gives me his blessing. He protects me from harm!
My faith shields me from all harm!
My protections weakens for now, but it shall return...
He must conserve his strength, so I will endure...
He requires a test. Survival without his protection...
I leave this mortal plane, and view the battle from beyond...
Hidden from unfaithful eyes, I strike true.
The Light is blinding. They cannot hope to lay sight on me.
My faith remains unbroken!
He continues to protect me!
My bulwark remains impenetrable!
My plate is strong. I will not fall.
My fragile body is protected by a shell of iron. I will not yield!
I am vigilant. No blow will pierce my defense!
The Light blinds the unfaithful!
Their eyes burn! They cannot handle the sins of their deeds!
Creatures of shadow, become vanquished by the Light!
They cower before his Radiance!
Our faith is strong! Theirs is weak!
I am immovable! They only weaken as the fight foes on!
Vile creatures! Their toxic deeds burn them from within!
The sin they carry is heavy. It will burn within their hearts!
I splash holy water upon you, and watch as you burn away!
We have the aid of a divine being, we shall not fail!
Know that even if we fall, we are guaranteed an afterlife in the heavens!
No matter how terrifying, the shadows always flee before the Light!
My faith pushes me forward!
My body is failing, yet I push on!
With his aid, I can survive the deadliest of blows!
"Foul demons of the earth and air, Shall flee from thy presence fair!"
"We bow us to our lot of care, Hear for a maid a maiden's prayer!"
"Safe may we sleep beneath thy care, Maiden! Hear a maiden's prayer!"

Zbroja pytowa

Uratowana przez wit interwencj, Serafin stara si chroni swoich sprzymierzecw przed ciemnoci i zepsuciem. Wzywa oczyszczajce pomienie, aby oczyci zo i pitnowa szczeglnie niegodziwe stworzenia, ktre bdzie sdzi. Gdy zblia si ku mierci, jej wiara i zwizek ze wiatem staj si silniejsze, a ona moe wezwa wiksze moce, by pokona wrogw. Jednak nawet dla tych, ktrzy wierz, Serafin jest niepokojcym obroc. Jej upiorny wygld i gorliwy zapa mog wystarczy, by wepchn wielu w krlestwo szalestwa.

Serafin przychodzi do bitwy odziana w penej zbroi pytowej. W doniach, dziery wity miecz, jako prawe skrzydo i niezomn tarcz, jak jej lewe skrzydo. Jednak nawet przy ochronie potnej tarczy i pyt, ciao Serafina jest kruche. Jeli jej zbroja zawiedzie, z pewnoci zginie.

Dla tych, ktrzy nie rozumiej, Serafin moe by przeraajcym bytem. Jej elazna forma i staa modlitwa sprawiaj, e wydaje si ona niemal obca w porwnaniu do innych osb tej samej wiary. Ale dla tych, ktrzy podaj za wiatem, Serafin jest lnicym strem, posanym do pokonania za. Nigdzie nie jest bezpieczniej ni w ochronie jej skrzyde.
I am fading. Perhaps I have ascended once more?
My fragile body begins to dissipate. Am I to join the heavens?
I begin to disappear. Have I become an angel?
I return to a physical form. Perhaps my duty is not done.
I am released into reality once more. The Light still has need of me.
Returned to my mortal state, I will continue my holy quest.
He fills me with a resurgence of divine vitality!
I am not to die yet! The Light has deemed it so!
I am awakened, the Light shines through me!
The power fades. I only hope I used it well...
I have used his gift well, and I return it to him...
I have used up all of his gift, and eagerly await his next blessing...
My plate is divine. It is impregnable!
He gives me his blessing. He protects me from harm!
My faith shields me from all harm!
My protections weakens for now, but it shall return...
He must conserve his strength, so I will endure...
He requires a test. Survival without his protection...
I leave this mortal plane, and view the battle from beyond...
Hidden from unfaithful eyes, I strike true.
The Light is blinding. They cannot hope to lay sight on me.
My faith remains unbroken!
He continues to protect me!
My bulwark remains impenetrable!
My plate is strong. I will not fall.
My fragile body is protected by a shell of iron. I will not yield!
I am vigilant. No blow will pierce my defense!
The Light blinds the unfaithful!
Their eyes burn! They cannot handle the sins of their deeds!
Creatures of shadow, become vanquished by the Light!
They cower before his Radiance!
Our faith is strong! Theirs is weak!
I am immovable! They only weaken as the fight foes on!
Vile creatures! Their toxic deeds burn them from within!
The sin they carry is heavy. It will burn within their hearts!
I splash holy water upon you, and watch as you burn away!
We have the aid of a divine being, we shall not fail!
Know that even if we fall, we are guaranteed an afterlife in the heavens!
No matter how terrifying, the shadows always flee before the Light!
My faith pushes me forward!
My body is failing, yet I push on!
With his aid, I can survive the deadliest of blows!
"Foul demons of the earth and air, Shall flee from thy presence fair!"
"We bow us to our lot of care, Hear for a maid a maiden's prayer!"
"Safe may we sleep beneath thy care, Maiden! Hear a maiden's prayer!"

Redimida por gracia divina, la Serafn busca proteger a sus aliados de la oscuridad y la corrupcin. Ella invoca a las llamas para purificar el mal y marca a fuego a las aberraciones ms dbiles para su juicio final. Cuando se merma su vitalidad, su fe y conexin con la Luz crecen y le otorgan mayor fuerza para desterrar a rivales. Sin embargo, incluso como creyente, la Serafn es una defensora inquebrantable. Su apariencia fantasmal junto al fervor entusiasta que porta son suficientes para impulsar a muchos al plano de la demencia.

La Serafn afronta la batalla atraviada con una ornamentada armadura de placas. Porta en sus manos una espada sagrada vigorosa como su ala derecha, y un escudo recio, como su defensiva ala izquierda. Sin embargo, bajo la poderosa coraza, se esconde un cuerpo frgil. Si su armadura se quebrara, acabara pereciendo.

Para aquellos que no ven la Verdad ,la Serafn puede ser una presencia intimidante. Su forma frrea y constantes plegarias la hacen parecer una desconocida comparada con otros creyentes. Pero para los seguidores de la Luz, la Serafn es una guardiana luminosa enviada para desterrar a la oscuridad. No hay mayor seguridad que la proteccin de sus alas.

The Light demands no intervention!
Stop! You will disrupt the ceremony!

I will not betray him with your spellcraft...
I must remain devoted and only accept aid from him.

YOUR PATHETIC SPELLS CANNOT AID ME!
A GOD REQUIRES NO HEALING!
LEAVE THE VESSEL AS IS!
I will not accept your hex!
Your wicked touch will have no effect on me!
Away with you, wretched thing!
I am not to acquire aid from anyone!
I only need the strength of the pain!
He speaks clearly when I am weakened!
The spirit is shattered, and cannot be repaired...
You cannot help return his voice to me...
Do not aid me. Perhaps he is testing me...
YOUR OFFERING INSULT ME!
YOU CANNOT AID A GOD!
YOUR BLESSING IS NOTHING TO ME!
He watches our every action, and he is pleased with our performance!
Celebrate our deeds, as we pave a new path for justice!

Allow me to recite a blessing for you.
*chanting*
He has granted you his healing touch, and you shall thank him with chivalrous deeds.
We will face harsh trails, but know that they are simply tests of our faith.
The Light is all powerful. No creature can stand against it.
Whether we live or die, the Light will ensure our salvation from the darkness.
I-I can't recite the blessings! They burn upon my tongue!
His power is an illusion! Evil cloaked as good!
*sobbing*
Even the Light's blessings are not powerful enough to cleanse their corrupted minds.
I will simply leave them to their devious scheming.
They are rabid dogs, looking to bite the hand that would feed them.
Holy Light! Accept my blood as redemption for my sins!
Please, you must whip me into submission! He demands it!
I shall flay my skin, and scrawl my many misdeeds upon it!
The Light will not offer comfort to those who do not deserve it.
With such unfaithful behaviour, how can he be expected to assist us at all?
You only take and take. You would never repay his kindness.
I hold many of his blessings, none of which are deserved by others.
He chose ME, so only I will be granted his boon.
He does not require my benevolence, so there is no need for such.
Without his blessing, I cannot help anyone...
I am a lost soul. I cannot give guidance to others...
I have no power. I would only make matters worse...
YOU ARE NOT WORTHY!
YOU MUST EARN MY FAVOR!
YOU HAVE FAILED TO PROVE YOURSELF!
I am in his sanctuary. Begone!
Your dark touch will not corrupt me!
I will not be a convert of evil!
As part of my trail, I must turn down all kindness.
He will not allow me such benevolence.
Please refrain! The suffering aids me!
You think you can provide what he does not? How ignorant.
You would simply tarnish my plate.
Your meager gift insults him.
There can be no rest for the damned...
I am not worthy of any benevolence...
If I were to accept, he would be angered...
DO NOT TOUCH THE VESSEL!
THIS ONE CANNOT BE HELPED!
It has not been sprinkled with holy water!
I can smell it. Corruption in the grain...
I must fast. It will help to make his voice clear.
You have it. He will favor me for my selflessness.
How can I accept such kindness after my faithless behaviour...
I cannot, as I must repent...
THIS VESSEL DOES NOT NEED SUSTENANCE!
A GOD DOES NOT EAT!
"Through thine sword of fire, thou shall smite the evil-doer and cleanse the land!"
You are guilty of heresy! Now you will pay!
He is angered, and I will deliver his wrath!
You shall suffer the consequence for your misbehaviour!
YOU HAVE INVITED MY WRATH, INSECT!
YOU INSULT MY POWER, SO YOU SHALL BE PUNISHED!
Purged in holy flame!
My blows strike true!
I have pleased the Light!
For the Light!
Vanquished!
Flee before his radiance!
Be cleansed!
My body is ruined, but my will does not falter!
I knocked on Death's door, and there was no answer...
My time has not come! The Light still has need of me!
You may destroy my body, but the Light will never let me die!

Many prayers have been answered as a divine being walks into town, clad in thrice-blessed plate and wielding a holy sword and shield. However, to those not of faith, all that arrives is a disturbing iron maiden...
Annual Purging
Sin builds up like a tumor, and every year the divine must purge themselves of such abhorrence. Such a ritual is sacrosanct, and no one is allowed to disturb them during their cleansing.

Saved by holy intervention, the Seraph seeks to protect her allies from darkness and corruption. She calls upon cleansing flames to purge evil and brand especially wicked creatures for judgement. As she nears death, her faith and connection to the Light grows stronger and she can call upon greater powers to vanquish her foes. However, even to those of faith, the Seraph is an unsettling defender. Her ghastly appearance and zealous fervor could be enough to push many into the realm of insanity.

The Seraph comes to battle adorned in full plate armor. In her hands, she carries a holy sword as her righteous right wing and a sturdy shield as her fortifying left wing. However, even with the protection of a mighty shield and plate, the Seraph's body is fragile. Should her armor fail her, she will surely perish.

To those who do not understand, the Seraph can be an intimidating presence. Her iron form and constant prayer make her seem almost alien compared to others of the same faith. But to those who follow the Light, the Seraph is a shining guardian sent to vanquish evil. Nowhere is safer than in the protection of her wings.
